item.description:
This is an amazing spot to see wildlife! I often see ducks, Canadian Geese, Red Winged Blackbirds, Chickadees, Robins, Orioles, Great Blue Herons, Otters and fish. We will meet at the refuge parking lot in Concord. From Concord Center take Route 62 east for about 1 - 2 miles. Take a left at Monsen Road and follow it to the parking lot.

The plan is to meet at 5:45pm, mingle and wait for people running slightly late.Â  We will leave at 6:00pm sharp and enjoy the great sites and sounds of the wildlife refuge!
item.name: Great Meadows National Wildlife Refuge
